    • getByID

      Optional<? extends T> getByID(String id) throws RepositoryException

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Optional

    • getAllById

      Optional<List<? extends T>> getAllById(List<String> idList) throws RepositoryException
      Gets entity based on a list of ids.
      Parameters:
      idList - List of ids for search.
      Returns:
      List
      Throws:
      RepositoryException

    • getByQuery

      Optional<List<? extends T>> getByQuery(ExagonRepositoryQuery query) throws RepositoryException
      Retrieves a list of entities based on the specified query. This method filters entities according to the given query criteria.
      Parameters:
      query - The ExagonQuery object containing the criteria for filtering entities.
      Returns:
      Optional<List < T>> containing the list of entities matching the query. The list is empty if no entities match the query.
      Throws:
      RepositoryParameterException - If there are issues with the parameters.
      RepositoryException

    • getByQuery

      <O extends T> Optional<List<O>> getByQuery(ExagonRepositoryQuery query, Class<O> subClass) throws RepositoryException
      Retrieves a list of entities based on the specified query and subclass. This method filters entities according to the given query and reconstructs them into the specified subclass.
      Parameters:
      query - The ExagonQuery object containing the criteria for filtering entities.
      subClass - The class object of the subclass into which the entities are to be reconstructed.
      Returns:
      Optional<List < T>> containing the list of reconstructed entities. The list is empty if no entities match the query.
      Throws:
      RepositoryParameterException - If there are issues with the parameters.
      RepositoryException

    • count

      long count(ExagonRepositoryQuery query) throws RepositoryException
      Counts the number of entities that match the specified query. This method calculates the total number of entities that fulfill the criteria defined in the given query.
      Parameters:
      query - The ExagonQuery object containing the criteria for counting entities.
      Returns:
      long representing the count of entities matching the query.
      Throws:
      RepositoryException

    • count

      <O extends T> long count(ExagonRepositoryQuery query, Class<O> subClass) throws RepositoryException
      Counts the number of entities that match the specified query and the provided subclass. This method calculates the total number of entities that fulfill the criteria defined in the given query.
      Parameters:
      query - The ExagonQuery object containing the criteria for counting entities.
      subClass - subClass The class object of the subclass.
      Returns:
      long representing the count of entities matching the query.
      Throws:
      RepositoryException
